name: CRFM Data Portal - Belize
description: A data portal managed by the Caribbean Regional Fisheries Mechanism (CRFM) Secretariat, providing access to fisheries and related datasets, documents, and resources. Organizations and Groups can be managed within the portal, and datasets may contain multiple resources such as Excel spreadsheets, Word documents, and external URLs.
data_themes: Agriculture, forestry, fisheries, food and veterinary
